claim.claim_preamble: A storm water pretreatment chamber comprising

claim.body: a base having a first surface and a second surface, wherein the first surface is connected to the ground adjacent the one or more storm water receiving features, wherein the second surface contacts the one or more filter sidewalls and the one or more water-impermeable sidewalls.
claim.claim-text: 2. The storm water pretreatment chamber of claim 1 , further comprising a base having a first surface and a second surface, wherein the first surface is connected to the ground adjacent the one or more storm water receiving features, wherein the second surface contacts the one or more filter sidewalls and the one or more water-impermeable sidewalls.

claim.body: the base comprises a water-impermeable base comprising concrete.
claim.claim-text: 3. The storm water pretreatment chamber of claim 2 , wherein the base comprises a water-impermeable base comprising concrete.

claim.body: the one or more water-impermeable sidewalls comprise one or more wood-plastic composite sheets.
claim.claim-text: 4. The storm water pretreatment chamber of claim 1 , wherein the one or more water-impermeable sidewalls comprise one or more wood-plastic composite sheets.

claim.body: the one or more filter sidewalls comprise one or more filters, wherein the one or more filters each independently comprise one or more plastic coated woven fiberglass screens, one or more rubber coated woven fiberglass screens, or one or more plastic and rubber coated woven fiberglass screens in an anodized aluminum frame.
claim.claim-text: 5. The storm water pretreatment chamber of claim 1 , wherein the one or more filter sidewalls comprise one or more filters, wherein the one or more filters each independently comprise one or more plastic coated woven fiberglass screens, one or more rubber coated woven fiberglass screens, or one or more plastic and rubber coated woven fiberglass screens in an anodized aluminum frame.

claim.body: the one or more filters each independently comprise openings that are smaller than the openings in the one or more chamber grates.
claim.claim-text: 6. The storm water pretreatment chamber of claim 5 , wherein the one or more filters each independently comprise openings that are smaller than the openings in the one or more chamber grates.

claim.body: one or more piers each supporting the one or more filter sidewalls, the one or more water-impermeable sidewalls, the one or more chamber grates, the one or more catch rails, or a combination thereof.
claim.claim-text: 7. The storm water pretreatment chamber of claim 1 , further comprising one or more piers each supporting the one or more filter sidewalls, the one or more water-impermeable sidewalls, the one or more chamber grates, the one or more catch rails, or a combination thereof.

claim.body: the debris and sediment trap collects materials that are smaller than the openings of the one or more chamber grates and larger than the openings in the one or more filter sidewalls.
claim.claim-text: 8. The storm water pretreatment chamber of claim 1 , wherein the debris and sediment trap collects materials that are smaller than the openings of the one or more chamber grates and larger than the openings in the one or more filter sidewalls.

claim.body: the one or more chamber grates comprise one or more cement materials, one or more concrete materials, one or more stone materials, one or more brick materials, one or more wood-plastic composite materials, one or more metals, one or more cement fiberboard materials, one or more fiberglass materials, one or more pressure-treated wood materials, one or more plastic materials, or a combination thereof.
claim.claim-text: 9. The storm water pretreatment chamber of claim 1 , wherein the one or more chamber grates comprise one or more cement materials, one or more concrete materials, one or more stone materials, one or more brick materials, one or more wood-plastic composite materials, one or more metals, one or more cement fiberboard materials, one or more fiberglass materials, one or more pressure-treated wood materials, one or more plastic materials, or a combination thereof.

claim.body: the one or more chamber grates cover the debris and sediment trap or the debris and sediment trap and a space between the one or more filter sidewalls and the one or more catch rails adjacent to the one or more storm water receiving features.
claim.claim-text: 10. The storm water pretreatment chamber of claim 1 , wherein the one or more chamber grates cover the debris and sediment trap or the debris and sediment trap and a space between the one or more filter sidewalls and the one or more catch rails adjacent to the one or more storm water receiving features.

claim.body: the one or more catch rails comprise one or more wood-plastic composite sheets, one or more metal sheets, one or more cement fiberboards, one or more fiberglass sheets, one or more pressure-treated wood planks, one or more plastic sheets, or a combination thereof.
claim.claim-text: 11. The storm water pretreatment chamber of claim 1 , wherein the one or more catch rails comprise one or more wood-plastic composite sheets, one or more metal sheets, one or more cement fiberboards, one or more fiberglass sheets, one or more pressure-treated wood planks, one or more plastic sheets, or a combination thereof.

claim.body: the one or more catch rails each independently comprise one or more wood-plastic composite sheets.
claim.claim-text: 12. The storm water pretreatment chamber of claim 11 , wherein the one or more catch rails each independently comprise one or more wood-plastic composite sheets.

claim.body: the storm water pretreatment chamber comprises a chamber grate, one filter sidewall, three water-impermeable sidewalls, and three catch rails, wherein the three catch rails are configured to provide an opening into the storm water pretreatment chamber opposite to one storm water receiving feature.
claim.claim-text: 13. The storm water pretreatment chamber of claim 1 , wherein the storm water pretreatment chamber comprises a chamber grate, one filter sidewall, three water-impermeable sidewalls, and three catch rails, wherein the three catch rails are configured to provide an opening into the storm water pretreatment chamber opposite to one storm water receiving feature.

claim.claim_preamble: A storm water pretreatment chamber comprising

claim.body: a base having a first surface and a second surface, wherein the first surface is connected to the ground adjacent the storm water receiving feature, wherein the second surface contacts the filter sidewall and the three water-impermeable sidewalls.
claim.claim-text: 15. The storm pretreatment chamber of claim 14 , further comprising a base having a first surface and a second surface, wherein the first surface is connected to the ground adjacent the storm water receiving feature, wherein the second surface contacts the filter sidewall and the three water-impermeable sidewalls.

claim.body: the base comprises a concrete slab.
claim.claim-text: 16. The storm water pretreatment chamber of claim 15 , wherein the base comprises a concrete slab.
